name: FSubsurfaceProfileStruct
doc: struct with all the settings we want in USubsurfaceProfile, separate to make it easer to pass this data around in the engine.

SurfaceAlbedo: It should match The base color of the corresponding material as much as possible.
MeanFreePathColor: Controls how far light goes into the subsurface in the Red, Green and Blue channel. It is scaled by Mean Free path distance.
MeanFreePathDistance: Subsurface mean free path distance in world/unreal units (cm)
WorldUnitScale: Control the scale of world/unreal units (cm)
bEnableBurley: Effective only when Burley subsurface scattering is enabled in cmd.
bEnableMeanFreePath: Switch to use Mean Free Path, otherwise use diffuse mean free path.
Tint:
Specifies the how much of the diffuse light gets into the material,
can be seen as a per-channel mix factor between the original image,
and the SSS-filtered image. It introduces Non-PBR looks.
TransmissionTintColor: Transmission tint control. It is multiplied on the transmission results. Works only when Burley is enabled.
